prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Organ, Piano, Drums, Brass, Guitar, Pipe, but without Synth Pad.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Organ, Piano, Drums, Brass, Guitar, Pipe - but no Synth Pad.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Organ, Piano, Drums, Brass, Guitar, Pipe - omitting Synth Pad.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Organ, Piano, Drums, Brass, Guitar, Pipe - excluding Synth Pad.
